mapper.insert: insert into c_collect (COLLECT_ID, GOODS_ID, BUSINESS_ID, ADD_TIME, IS_EXPIRES, EXPIRES_DATE, IS_CANCEL, MODIFIED_TIME) values (#{collectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isExpires,jdbcType=BIT}, #{expiresDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isCancel,jdbcType=BIT}, #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update c_collect set GOODS_ID = #{goodsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUSINESS_ID = #{businessId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADD_TIME = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_EXPIRES = #{isExpires,jdbcType=BIT}, EXPIRES_DATE = #{expiresDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_CANCEL = #{isCancel,jdbcType=BIT}, MODIFIED_TIME = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where COLLECT_ID = #{collectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select COLLECT_ID, GOODS_ID, BUSINESS_ID, ADD_TIME, IS_EXPIRES, EXPIRES_DATE, IS_CANCEL, MODIFIED_TIME from c_collect where COLLECT_ID = #{collectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select COLLECT_ID, GOODS_ID, BUSINESS_ID, ADD_TIME, IS_EXPIRES, EXPIRES_DATE, IS_CANCEL, MODIFIED_TIME from c_collect
